linkedinPreviousJobDescription: Working with Calband's other Coordinating Committee subcommittee, Musical Activities Committee, to procure a composition of music that is optimized to fit the skill level of the band while also challenging them to improve in musical performance quality. Simultaneously, I had to create an entire halftime show for Cal Football's game against Miami during the famous College Game Day and, coincidentally, Alumni Band Day, requiring over 100+ hours working within our show editing software, "CalChart". CalChart is a GitHub extension that is, for lack of a better word, retro. Using graphic design skills, I had to make sure that all image transitions operated smoothly without collisions while also making sure that set groups of instruments remain close together to negate noise splitting and enhance the music quality itself. My philosophy was that the choreography had to be intuitive yet also fun and challenging to improve the marchers for future shows.
